meanings.definition: Consisting of several parts or elements
meanings.sent1: The multipart toy had many pieces to assemble.
meanings.sent2: The car engine is a multipart system with various components.
meanings.sent3: The multipart cake recipe called for a dozen different ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a multipart puzzle, each piece contributing to the whole.
meanings.sent5: The multipart necklace was made up of various gemstones of different colors.

meanings.definition: Involving or including multiple parts or components
meanings.sent1: The multipart project required teamwork from everyone.
meanings.sent2: The computer software had a multipart installation process.
meanings.sent3: The multipart game level became more challenging with each new section.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a multipart presentation, covering various topics in detail.
meanings.sent5: The multipart event included activities for people of all ages.
